If you're unsure, I can help you create a shopping list based on your family's needs. What types of groceries do you typically buy?

user_profile.name: Mark Thompson
user_profile.description: Mark Thompson is a 50-year-old academic with a background in research, known for his analytical nature and attention to detail. With limited experience in technology and a preference for reading and writing, he seeks to order groceries online as a way to streamline his busy life while still focusing on high-quality nutrition. Although he is generally reserved and prefers concise communication, his risk-taking personality drives him to embrace new methods for convenience despite feeling a bit impatient with the process.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Weekly grocery shopping for family meals
Ordering snacks and beverages for gatherings
